We need to produce JSON for file: nemo/collections/nlp/models/dialogue/sgdqa_model.py

We have description: "fast, multi‑pass schema‑guided dialogue state tracking model that processes each conversational turn, scores schema entities with a neural NLU component, and assembles slot‑value pairs via a rule‑based tracker to generate the dialogue state. It integrates data loading, preprocessing, loss computation, encoder/decoder modules, and utilities for training, evaluation, and prediction within the NeMo framework."

We need summary, business_intent, keywords.

Summary: The module implements a schema-guided dialogue state tracking model (SGDQA) that uses neural NLU to score schema entities and rule-based tracker to assemble slot-value pairs across multiple passes per turn, handling data loading, preprocessing, loss, encoder/decoder, training/evaluation/prediction within NeMo.

Business intent: Provide a solution for building efficient, accurate dialogue state tracking for task-oriented conversational agents, enabling automatic extraction of slot values according to a predefined schema, improving virtual assistants, customer support bots, etc.

Keywords: schema-guided dialogue, state tracking, multi-pass, neural NLU, rule-based tracker, slot filling, dialogue management, NeMo, data loading, preprocessing, loss computation, encoder-decoder, training, evaluation, prediction, conversational AI.

Make JSON.

Need to output only JSON starting with {{ and ending with }}.

assistantfinal{{"summary": "The module implements a fast, multi‑pass schema‑guided dialogue state tracking model that processes each turn, uses a neural NLU component to score schema entities, and combines the scores with a rule‑based tracker to assemble slot‑value pairs and produce the dialogue state. It includes data loading, preprocessing, loss computation, encoder/decoder modules, and training, evaluation, and prediction utilities within the NeMo framework.", "business_intent": "Provide an efficient, accurate solution for task‑oriented conversational agents to automatically track dialogue state against a predefined schema, enabling virtual assistants and customer‑service bots to understand user goals and fill required slots.", "keywords": ["schema‑guided dialogue", "state tracking", "multi‑pass", "neural NLU", "
